dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper describes a collaborative initiative for developing a telemedicine model on for Colombia and Latin America from a social perspective This was led by the Colombian Telemedicine Center CTMC with the participation of teams from Mexico Costa Rica Panama and Argentina in addition to on going interaction with academic institutions such as Javeriana University Icesi University and Murcia University
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
A Latin American telemedicine social perspective from a Colombian telemedicine center initiative.
